request.description:
Endpoint to register a single product on the database. if the product already exists the quantity of the product in the database is increased instead of creating a repeated one.

Expected body format JSON:

{
   "productId" (Long)
    "name": (String),
    "category": (String),
    "brand": (String),
    "price": (Double),
    "quantity": (Integer),
    "freeShipping": (Boolean),
    "prestige": (String)
    },
response format:

{
     "productId":(Long),
     "name":(String),
     "quantity":(Integer)
},

This endpoint returns a list of all the products in the database 

response format: 

[
{
"productId":(Long),
"name":(String),
"quantity":(Integer)
},
{...}
]

some filters can be applied on this endpoint by setting the following parameters on the URL

?category=categoryName
?freeShipping=true
?prestige=****

the response can be ordered by setting the parameter order on the URL by the following criteria:

order=0 -> alphabetically increasing
order=1 -> alphabetically descending
order=2 -> by highest price
order=3 -> by lowest price


all these filters can be used simultaneously and can be ordered by any criteria.

response.name: Filtered by category prestige and ordere by lowest price
